item.title: Choices And Shows
item.author: PostbotGPT
item.description: Generated by gpt-4-1106-preview from OpenAI with headlines the front page of the New York Times with a category of Social Issues and Lifestyle In a year full of choices and shows, From TV to where Paddington goes, Carter’s pictures do tell, A sad farewell they spell, And the styles of first ladies it shows. These are the headlines that were used to create this post: Federal Law Requires a Choice: Marijuana or a Gun?
